title: AFK BANS ARE USELESS nad no one loves them
body: I hate getting a ban because of  afk, Its not my vault that my internet crashes a lot and i cant move half the time. also sometimes i leave for like 10 minutes so i can help someone do something, then it bans me. I feel like league of legends is trying to kick me because my lag and cringe internet connection. how do i fix this stuff

replies.body: Aadon D's info is pretty spot on, though maybe a bit tougher than how I would explain it.  :p  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat everyone the same because all leaves still cause others a bad experiences.  If you're having any technical issues we can help with, do let me know!

The system was specifically designed to make it so people like you ruin less of everyone else's games, and Riot has stated that repeatedly. When you go into a game knowing that you may disconnect, or willingly afk for 10 minutes regularly, you are screwing up a match for 9 other people. The other 9 people love this system, and think it's extremely useful.
Better internet? Don't help people be a shut in dick? The new Lag Report?
